page.title: 13Community Activities
page.content: There are three angling clubs in the area.They fish in the Butetown; Rhaslas and Fochriw ponds. Fochriw has a BMX track. People hang-glide from the hill tops.There is a Model Aeroplane field where The Valley Fliers fly radio controlled models. Many people have ponies and belong to the Fochriw pony club.Rhymney has both soccer and rugby clubs.Pontlottyn and Fochriw have soccer clubs.Rhymney and Fochriw both have jazz bands.Rhymney has its youth brass band.All clubs and public houses have their darts teams. There are youth clubs in Fochriw and Rhymney.Pontlottyn and Rhymney have keep fit classes in their community centres. The Brewery Club in Rhymney also has old time dancing.Rhymney has a Public Llbrary which serves the district.
